      • readAsString

        public static java.lang.String readAsString(java.lang.String filePath,
                            int... lines)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Read String from file at specified line numbers, e.g. read two lines at line position 10, 100, starting from line 1. Note that line numbers must be ordered from min to max; hence before invoke this method, use ordering method first
        Parameters:
        filePath - file path
        lines - specified line numbers
        Returns:
        read string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error occurs during reading
